brewery.brewery_description:
The Hop Studio is a microbrewery specialising in brewing modern craft beer of all types and styles in Cask, Keg and Can.

Founded in 2011, and reborn in 2020, the brewery sells direct to customers in our brewery shop, through our online store and into the pub, bar and restaurant trade through the brewery or our online trade portal.

Designed with flavour at their core, our beers are produced in small unique batches with the best quality and freshest ingredients.

items.checkin_comment: Sep '15. Cask conditioned at a Wetherspoons.

beer.beer_description: Our Extra Pale ale combines balanced light citrus fruit and hop flavours, with an intense creamy bitter finish.

items.checkin_comment: Sep '15. Keg at The Marine Bar, Bridlington, E.Yorks.

beer.beer_description: Our take on the classic pilsner. A clean and crisp full malt lager with a balanced mix of herbal and spicy noble hops. Our extended maturation periods ensure a lager of the highest quality.

items.badge_description: The power of pilsner! Part of our first round of “Super Style” badges in 2023, celebrate this crisp, clean lager, which ranked as the 10th most checked-in style of 2021 with over 1M check-ins. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

items.checkin_comment: Oct '15. Cask conditioned at Oxford Beer Festival ’15.

beer.beer_description: (Seasonal - Autumn) Our annual green hop ale. Brewed within 24 hours of the hops being harvested, Beerjolais contains over 5Kg per barrel of English hops which provide a delicate fragrance characteristic.

items.checkin_comment: Sep '16. Cask conditioned at The Old Shambles Tavern, York.

user.bio: Wigston Field's top ticker.  Previously on Ratebeer.

beer.beer_description: Strong and complex, our extra special ale contains an array of malts, hops and our english ale yeast to provide the palate with a great depth of flavours including hints of dark fruits, floral and citrus notes from the generous addition of New Zealand hops late in the boil.

user.bio: Wigston Field's top ticker.  Previously on Ratebeer.

beer.beer_description: A simple, yet effective malt base provides a backbone upon which New Zealand Motueka hops are generuosly added to create a beer full of lemon, lime and peach flavours.

items.checkin_comment: Sep '17. Cask conditioned at The Blue Bell, York.

beer.beer_description: A ‘big’ autumnal pale ale brewed with oats and Mosaic hops. Aroma of berries and pine complement pine and herbal flavours.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 215 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 44.

items.checkin_comment: May '19. Cask conditioned at The Kelham Island Tavern, Kelham Island, Sheffield, S.Yorks.

beer.beer_description:
A rich and velvety oatmeal stout. Huge chocolate, coffee and oat hit. A complex array of American and British hops provide subtle blackcurrant and cherry flavours.

Unfined/Unfiltered, Vegan/Vegetarian friendly

items.badge_description:
Thank you for celebrating International Stout Day by savoring a delicious stout! Stout enthusiasts like you know that there's a world of flavor waiting to be explored within the stout family, from classic dry stouts to rich barrel-aged stouts, and everything in between. Here's a toast to the deep, complex, and delightful world of stouts!

Keep exploring the rich, roasted flavors and aromatic notes that stouts have to offer, and earn other great stout badges like Beyond a Shadow of a Stout, Heavy Weight, Dessert Time! and more.

beer.beer_description: A hybrid between two styles, this strong bottom-fermented beer is brewed with high quantities of American aroma hops, delivering gentle citrus and big grapefruit flavours you could be mistaken it's a lager.
A simple, yet effective malt base provides a backbone upon which New Zealand Motueka hops are generuosly added to create a beer full of lemon, lime and peach flavours.
A very refreshing, pale blonde ale. Much bigger ﬂavour than the strength suggests. Huge gooseberry, grapefruit and citrus hit in the taste and aroma.
Black IPA brewed with an abundance of galaxy, chinook, centennial and columbus hops. Post-fermentation this beer is the dry hopped to lift aromas of tropical fruits and grapefruit out of the glass.

Strong and complex, our extra special ale contains an array of malts, hops and our english ale yeast to provide the palate with a great depth of flavours including hints of dark fruits, floral and citrus notes from the generous addition of New Zealand hops late in the boil.
